This package is for Applications hosted on AZURE CLOUD accessing IBM Data Servers.

The framework support is from .Net Framework 4.5.1 onwards.

For more information, please go through the below link:
https://www.ibm.com/developerworks/community/blogs/96960515-2ea1-4391-8170-b0515d08e4da/entry/ibmdbadonetazureclouddriver?lang=en
